name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hauk Tuah Image Replacer for Trolling

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you want to troll your friends, this extension is for you. Replace all images of every webpage with Hauk Tuah's gif's.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Troll your friends with the Hauk Tuah girl GIFS that will be replacing the whole page images
